name: A Soul's Revenge
description:
After going into a coma, Mr Robert started having weird dreams. It seems they have a strong link to bats, especially Covid - 19 infected ones. 

 The first dream is weird, without any context and overly repetitive. You will not be able to get out of it so easy, but of course, there are always ways.

 An infinite nightmare of revenge, one in which if he gets touched, his soul would get corrupted and he would wake up again, in the same place, in the same universe, doing the same thing over and over again. What could there be next?

NOTE: This game is at the simplest level of gameplay possible. Its modesty is broke only by the context in which it is played.
